page.topic: Where do I Enter My License?
page.description: TransForm license(s) are entered into TransForm Central.

description.p: The license number(s) you buy from the Alpha Software store are entered in TransForm Central. Click the Home tab, then click Account License Keys.
Enter your license(s) in the box and click *[ui:Save]*

tip.p: Click *[ui:Show License Information]* to see detailed info about your TransForm license(s), including number of users and expiration date.

description.p: [Contact the Alpha Software sales team] if you have questions about existing licenses or to purchase additional TransForm license keys.
